DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate D1 Receptor Occupancy (RO) following a single dose of PF-06412562 In healthy male volunteers
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate D1 Receptor Occupancy (RO) Following Single Dose of PF-06412562 In Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male Volunteers Evidence or history of clinically significant hepatic, renal, cardiovascular, endocrine, hematologic, gastrointestinal, pulmonary, neurologic, oncologic, psychiatric, or allergic disease Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption A positive urine drug screen
